data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Bayern to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bayern, Germany
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Bayern, Germany to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 47 lost neighbors

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Bayern, Germany that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, we ask for 2,502 new simple churches in the state of Bayern, Germany. Place a simple church in every community of the 12,510,300 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Japanese people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Bayern.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Bayern, Germany that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.section_summary:
the state of Bayern, Germany has a population of 12,510,300.

We estimate Bayern has 260,737 people who might know Jesus, 7,403,170 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 4,846,393 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 47 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Bayern, Germany find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.
